name: Ausstellung Kriegerehrungen LCCN2004665831 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Ausstellung Kriegerehrungen Abstract: Poster shows tombstone on which is carved an Iron Cross, a German soldier's helmet and birth and death dates, the death date indicating death occurred at Verdun. Text announces an exhibition and includes the Berlin address and viewing hours. Physical description: 1 photomechanical print (poster) : halftone ; 70 x 41 cm. Notes: Bober.; Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Title from item.
